titles.title: A bill to require that all Government records that contain information bearing on the last flight and disappearance of Amelia Earhart be transmitted to the Library of Congress and made available to the public.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Directs executive agency heads to: (1) search their agency records to identify information relevant to the last flight and disappearance of Amelia Earhart; and (2) transmit it to the Library of Congress, where it shall be made public.
